sentences.sentence: Bogs are also flooded with sunshine, so even an inefficient carnivorous plant can photosynthesise enough light to survive.
sentences.translation: 沼泽也充满阳光，所以即使是低效的食肉植物也能获得足够的光，依靠光合作用生存。

sentences.sentence: Some C4 plants, for example, absorb CO2 and photosynthesise it at either end of special elongated[4] cells, instead of separating the functions out into two different types of cell.
sentences.translation: 比如说，有的C4植物对CO2的吸收和光合都是分别在某一类长形的特殊细胞两端进行，而非分散到两类不同的细胞中。
